Reviews.Title: Best Ive ever had
Reviews.Author: Tristan
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera i have ever had. got a refurbished one with a minor cosmetic scuff but its well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: This is THE camera!
Reviews.Author: O. J. Burd "photo pro"
Reviews.Content: I was using one Canon Digital Rebel XSi/450D and upgraded to the 550D.Wow!The new one is fantastic in many aspects: velocity, quality of colors and construction.And - of course - the full HD movie!If you want to buy a good SLR camera, buy this one!You can see some photos I did using the 550D here:[...]Regards,Oscar Burd

ProductInfo.Features:
Same as Canon EOS Rebel T2i / 550D * 18.0 MP CMOS (APS-C) Sensor
Full HD 1080p Video * Advanced Live View
3.0" 1.04 Million Dot Clear View LCD * Up to 3.7 fps RAW, JPEG, or RAW+JPEG
ISO 100-6400, Expandable to 12800 * 63-Zone Metering / 9-Point AF system
Compatible with SD, SDHC, and SDXC * Eye-Fi Menu Status Indicator Support
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Kiss X4 (T2i / 550D) 18 MP CMOS APS-C Digital SLR Camera with 3 inch LCD + EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens (Japan Made)
